thread.title: Miss Livingstone

author: Miss Livingstone
title: Miss Livingstone
text: If you live in the Highlands be aware the postage goes from £4.99 to £9.99 & if goods are unsuitable you can send back by Royal Mail at whatever charge depending on weight etc or by Collect+ For £4.49, I think this is scandalous to be charged to return goods, I won't be ordering from Uttings again, which is a shame as the product was great quality The only reason I was returning was because they were too big.
